alert.note: Alert for Del Norte Interior; Northern Humboldt Interior; Southern Humboldt Interior; Southern Lake County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued November 24 at 2:15AM PST until November 24 at 9:00AM PST by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 29. * WHERE...Del Norte Interior, Northern Humboldt Interior, Southern Humboldt Interior and Southern Lake Counties. * WHEN...Until 9 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops and other sensitive vegetation.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. Provide adequate shelter for outdoor pets or consider bringing them indoors. Frost Advisories and Freeze Warnings are issued during the local growing season as defined by climatology and local agriculture experts. Once the growing season has ended these statements will no longer be issued until the spring.

area.areaDesc: Del Norte Interior; Northern Humboldt Interior; Southern Humboldt Interior; Southern Lake County
